channel.title: Harbor on ModernApps Ninja Home
channel.description: Recent content in Harbor on ModernApps Ninja Home

item.title: How to Set Up a Harbor Registry with Self-Signed Certificates for Tanzu Kubernetes Clusters
item.description: Learn how to inject self-signed certificates for any container registry into a Tanzu Kubernetes cluster.

item.title: How to install Harbor 2.0 on a Photon OS VM
item.description: How to install Harbor 2.0 on a Photon OS VM

item.title: vSphere 7 with Kubernetes supercharged - Helm, Harbor and Tanzu Kubernetes Grid
item.description: This post focus on the installation of Harbor using Helm and also on the preperations you have to do upfront before you are able to let the Supervisor Cluster pull images out of Harbor and to subsequently instantiate them as a native Pod on vSphere.
